BBEX3.A.COP.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Colombia / USD 1 = COP ... (buying)

Source: Since April 2003: Superintendencia Financiera de Colombia, Bogotá, D.C. (formerly: Superintendencia Bancaria de Colombia). 1995 - March 2003: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg (formerly: Deutsch-Südamerikanische Bank AG).
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of reporting date rates (generally one rate per week).
